chapters.title: Chapter 28:  Crimsonthorn
chapters.info: Lord Luan Norwelyn, p. 550 (627)—Andoran noble, leader of a strong House that supported Morgase during the Succession. Morgase exiled him from Caemlyn as per Gaebril's suggestion, but hopes he will still support her when she comes to claim the throne. Elayne also hopes he will support her claim to the throne.
